title: Den/Study, Sand Volleyball Court, Granite Countertops
neighborhood: 550 N. Figueroa st., Los Angeles, CA
map_address: 550 N. Figueroa st. near Figueroa st and Cesar Chaves Ave
posting_body: ['Imagine a home where the fine art of living has been perfected.', 'Welcome to The Orsini, home to the best apartments in downtown Los Angeles.', 'From the moment you enter the elegant Mediterranean inspired 2-story foyer at The Orsini, you will realize that you have come home to a new experience in luxury apartment living.', 'We are in the heart of Los Angeles, California and the pulse of extraordinary living.', 'Enjoy a short commute to the LA Fashion District, Staples Center, Disney Concert Hall, Chinatown and all the amazing dining and glamorous shopping that living in Los Angeles has to offer.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Crown Molding', '-Built-in Microwave', '-Airy Interiors with Nine Foot Ceilings', '-Junior Olympic-Size Swimming Pool and Spa (Heated for Year-Round Use)', '-Six Private Computer Rooms with High-Speed Internet Access', '-Natural Stone Marble Counter Bath', '-Den/Study', '-Two Mail Rooms with Package Acceptance Services', '-Resident Lounge with Full Bar & Kitchen Facilities', '-Two Conference Rooms for Meetings', '-Two 24-Hour State-Of-The-Art Fitness Centers', '-Powerball Carpeting', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '550 N.
